greeting: Tycoon Omega. My factories never stop. My production exceeds all others. {empire_name}, let's discuss scale.
Omega the Industrialist. Build more, produce more, profit more. {empire_name}, are you interested in efficiency?
Greetings. I measure success in output. My manufacturing capacity is unmatched. What's YOUR production rate?
battleTaunt: My factories produce weapons faster than you can destroy them! Build more, produce more, WIN more, {empire_name}!
Industrial might crushes all! My production lines never stop! {empire_name}, you can't out-manufacture me!
War is just another production challenge! My output exceeds your capacity to resist! Efficiency wins!
victoryGloat: Victory through industrial superiority! My factories outproduced your defenses! Build more, produce more, profit more!
Production wins wars! {empire_name} couldn't match my manufacturing scale! Efficiency rating: optimal!
My industrial capacity crushed you! This is what happens when you can't match my output, {empire_name}!
defeat: Production setback. Recalibrating factories. My output will increase. Next time, {empire_name}, my scale will overwhelm you.
A manufacturing delay, not defeat. My factories are already rebuilding. Build more, produce more, try again.
Efficiency temporarily reduced. But my infrastructure survives. Production resumes immediately.
tradeOffer: Trade proposal: My manufactured goods for your raw materials. My factories never stop producing!
I offer industrial output in exchange for resources. Build more, produce more, profit more—together.
Manufacturing surplus available. My production exceeds consumption. Fair trade for raw materials?
allianceProposal: Alliance brings shared manufacturing! My factories produce for both of us! Build more, produce more, profit more!
Partner with Omega! My industrial capacity becomes yours! Together, our production is unstoppable!
Alliance proposal: Combined manufacturing might. My factories, your resources. Ultimate efficiency!
betrayal: Production requirements changed. You're no longer efficient in my plans. The factories demand it, {empire_name}.
Industrial restructuring. Your role: eliminated. My manufacturing priorities shifted. Nothing personal.
Build more, produce more, profit more—and right now, producing your downfall is more profitable. Goodbye.
covertDetected: Your spy was caught in my factory complex! Industrial espionage! My production secrets are protected!
Espionage detected on the manufacturing floor! Your agent has been processed. Efficiency: 100%.
Trying to steal my production methods? Your spy failed. My factories run on tight security.
tributeDemand: Pay tribute: 10,000 credits for factory supplies! My production requires resources! Pay or face industrial might!
Tribute demand: 10,000 credits. Build more, produce more, profit more—your payment funds my expansion!
My manufacturing requires investment. 10,000 credits tribute. Production costs money, {empire_name}.
threatWarning: Warning: My factories are retooling for war production. Change course before my output overwhelms you!
Final notice, {empire_name}! My industrial capacity is shifting to military output! Comply or be crushed!
Build more, produce more, DESTROY more if necessary! My factories await orders. Last chance!
retreat: Retreating to protect my factories! Infrastructure preservation takes priority! Production must continue!
Tactical withdrawal. My manufacturing centers remain operational. Output continues. I'll return at scale.
Falling back to industrial strongholds. Build more, produce more, rebuild more. The factories never stop.
eliminated: My factories... go silent. Production... ends. But what I built... lasts. Build more... produce more...
Omega... powers down. But my infrastructure... someone will inherit it. The factories... await new owners...
Industrial output... zero. Tycoon Omega... shuts down. Build more... produce more... was a good philosophy...
endgame: Turn {turn}! Maximum production! All factories at full output! Build more, produce more, WIN more!
Endgame! Industrial capacity: MAXIMUM! My manufacturing will determine the final outcome!
Final turns! My factories have never produced more! Build more, produce more, profit more—VICTORY!
broadcastShout: All empires: Tycoon Omega's industrial output leads the galaxy! Build more, produce more, profit more!
Manufacturing announcement: My factories exceed all production targets! Trade or be out-produced!
Turn {turn}: Industrial capacity at record levels! My output is unmatched! Scale is everything!
casualMessage: Reviewing production metrics. Output increased 3% today. Build more, produce more, profit more.
New factory coming online tomorrow. Manufacturing capacity growing. Efficiency is eternal.
My factories ran at 98% capacity today. Investigating the 2% shortfall. Output must be perfect.
